sourcesContent:
import "./EventItem.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faBars } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; const EventItem = (props) => { return (

{props.authorFirstName}

@{props.authorUsername}

{props.sport}#{props.level} Edit Delete
{props.county === props.city ? props.county : props.county + ', ' + props.city}
{props.location.length >= 2 ? Place: {props.location} : null}
{props.description}

  • Date

    {props.date}

  • Start:

    {props.time}

  • Joined

    1/{props.nrPlayers}

  • Who can join:

    {props.allowed === false ? 'Everyone' : `${props.level}`}

); }; export default EventItem;
